pages.text: $(li)The Illagers Mines are used by the Illagers to get all the minerals that they need.$(br)$(li)They like to get all this stuff fast, that explains all the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt)TNT$(/l) that it can be found in this place.$(br)$(li)Be careful, the $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:illagers/miner)Miners$(/l) will not hesistate to attack you to defend their resources.

$(li)The Illager Mine can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/badlands)Badlands$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/mushroom/mushroom_fields)Mushroom Fields$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savanna$(/l) of the Overworld.
